          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <span style="font-weight: 300;">
             Neurasmus :
             <br/>
             Your European
            </span>
            <span style="font-weight: bold;">
             <br/>
             Neuroscience Master
            </span>
           </h1>
           <p>
            <a class="button-primary button-secondary text-center" href="/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Neurasmus-2025-European-master-in-Neuroscience-v2.pdf" style="margin-top:10px; display:block;" target="_blank">
             Download brochure
            </a>
           </p>

          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            Unlock the mysteries of the brain and
            <br/>
            elevate your future in neuroscience.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

    <div id="et-main-area">
     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-2750 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-2750">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0 inverse et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_0 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                At Neurasmus, we believe that the best way to understand the brain is to explore it from every angle. With our unique blend of academic excellence, hands-on research, and cultural immersion, this two-year Master’s program offers an unparalleled opportunity to learn, grow, and connect. Whether you’re aiming to contribute to groundbreaking discoveries, advance scientific knowledge, or shape the future of healthcare, Neurasmus equips you with the tools and experiences to make your mark.
               </p>
               <p>
                Join a global network of passionate learners and researchers, and let Neurasmus be the springboard to your success.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_0_wrapper et_pb_module">
              <a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_0 button-primary et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/program/program-presentation/">
               Discover program
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_1 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">

               <noscript>

            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_3 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 What is
                </span>
                NEURASMUS ?
               </h3>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Are you ready to combine your passion for neuroscience with a life-changing international experience?
                </strong>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Neurasmus is a prestigious European Master’s program designed for curious minds eager to explore the complexities of the brain while thriving in
                <strong>
                 a dynamic, multicultural setting
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
               <p>
                Over the course of two years, you’ll delve into the core principles of neuroscience and gain expertise in areas like neuroanatomy, neurophysiology, and computational neuroscience. Neurasmus allows you to work alongside
                <strong>
                 world-renowned researchers
                </strong>
                in state-of-the-art laboratories, fostering skills that transcend borders.
               </p>
               <p>
                This program isn’t just about academic learning; it’s about transformation. You’ll study in at least two of
                <strong>
                 Europe or Canada’s top universities
                </strong>
                , experience diverse cultures, and expand your global perspective. With workshops on transdisciplinary themes, international conferences, and access to leading researchers, Neurasmus offers a
                <strong>
                 holistic approach to education
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
               <p>
                Whether you’re envisioning a future in academia, the pharmaceutical industry, or healthcare innovation, Neurasmus opens the door to limitless opportunities. This is more than a Master’s degree—it’s the
                <strong>
                 foundation of a lifelong journey in neuroscience
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 <em>
                  Why wait to shape the future of neuroscience? Join Neurasmus and begin your journey today.
                 </em>
                </strong>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_2 et_pb_gutters2">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_4 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 Why
                </span>
                study here
               </h2>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Choosing the right Master’s program is more than an academic decision—it’s about
                <strong>
                 shaping your future
                </strong>
                . At Neurasmus, we combine excellence in neuroscience with a supportive, multicultural environment designed to help you thrive. Our program is built on the belief that students learn best when they are
                <strong>
                 challenged, inspired, and connected
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
               <p>
                Whether you’re looking for world-class education, access to cutting-edge research, or the chance to be part of a
                <strong>
                 vibrant international community
                </strong>
                , Neurasmus offers an experience like no other. Here, you’ll gain the knowledge, skills, and network needed to achieve your goals and
                <strong>
                 make a real impact in the field of neuroscience
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
               <p>
                Let’s explore what makes Neurasmus the perfect choice for ambitious minds like yours:
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            Neurasmus is not just a Master’s program—it’s a benchmark in neuroscience education. Recognized as a leader in the field, Neurasmus combines academic excellence, international collaboration, and innovative research to provide students with an unparalleled learning experience. Designed for ambitious minds, this program offers the unique opportunity to study at Europe’s most prestigious universities, gain hands-on research experience, and build a global network that lasts a lifetime.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

        </div>

    <div id="et-main-area">
     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-2330 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-2330">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0 et_pb_gutters2">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 Discover Our
                </span>
                Program and Values
               </h2>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                At Neurasmus, we believe in combining rigorous academics with meaningful, real-world experiences. Our program is built on a foundation of excellence, innovation, and collaboration, preparing students to excel in both their careers and personal development.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_1 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_1 inverse et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_1 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 Why choose
                </span>
                NEURASMUS ?
               </h3>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               Discover why Neurasmus is recognized as a benchmark in neuroscience education. Our program is built on a foundation of values that drive success, both academically and personally. By choosing Neurasmus, you’ll join a community that prioritizes:
               <ul>
                <li>
                 Academic Excellence: Learn from top-tier faculty and institutions renowned for their expertise in neuroscience.
                </li>
                <li>
                 Interdisciplinary Research: Engage with cutting-edge methods that integrate molecular, cellular, and cognitive neuroscience.
                </li>
                <li>
                 Global Network: Join a multicultural community of students and alumni spanning the globe.
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_0_wrapper et_pb_module">
              <a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_0 button-primary et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/program/why-choose-neurasmus/">
               Learn more about why you should choose Neurasmus
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_2 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242529" decoding="async" height="514" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-why-choose-neurasmus.jpg" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-why-choose-neurasmus.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-why-choose-neurasmus-480x440.jpg 480w" title="program-why-choose-neurasmus" width="561"/>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_1">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-2467" decoding="async" height="304" sizes="(max-width: 250px) 100vw, 250px" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments.webp" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments.webp 250w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments-247x300.webp 247w" title="red-dot-ornaments" width="250"/>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_2 et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_3 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_2">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242531" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities-480x440.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="514" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20561%20514'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="program-partner-universities" width="561"/>
               <noscript>
                <img alt="" class="wp-image-242531" decoding="async" height="514" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities.jpg" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/program-partner-universities-480x440.jpg 480w" title="program-partner-universities" width="561"/>
               </noscript>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_3">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-2532" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-dot-ornaments.webp" decoding="async" height="259" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20218%20259'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="green-dot-ornaments" width="218"/>
               <noscript>
                <img alt="" class="wp-image-2532" decoding="async" height="259" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-dot-ornaments.webp" title="green-dot-ornaments" width="218"/>
               </noscript>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_4 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 Partner
                </span>
                Universities
               </h3>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Collaborate with Europe’s most prestigious academic institutions and benefit from their unparalleled resources. Neurasmus’ network of partner universities ensures you’ll gain access to:
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  International Mobility Opportunities:
                 </strong>
                 Study in multiple countries and immerse yourself in diverse academic cultures.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Access to Leading Laboratories:
                 </strong>
                 Gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge equipment and methodologies.
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_1_wrapper et_pb_module">
              <a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_1 button-primary et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/program/partners-universities/">
               Discover our partner universities and their unique benefits.
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_4 et_section_regular">

          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             Why Choose Neurasmus?
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            <strong>
             Your gateway to academic excellence, personal growth, and professional success in neuroscience.
            </strong>
           </p>
           <p>
            Choosing Neurasmus means more than enrolling in a Master’s program—it means becoming part of a
            <strong>
             prestigious, innovative, and close-knit community
            </strong>
            . As a Neurasmate, you’ll have the chance to push the boundaries of brain research, learn from world-renowned experts, and thrive in a multicultural environment that celebrates both
            <strong>
             academic rigor and personal developmen
            </strong>
            t. Whether your goal is to pursue groundbreaking research, contribute to global health, or innovate in neuroscience, Neurasmus is the perfect place to start your journey.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_2_tb_header et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty">

     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-2428 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-2428">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                Neurasmus: academic excellence
               </h2>
               <p>
                Neurasmus stands as a beacon of academic excellence in the field of neuroscience. This
                <strong>
                 Erasmus Mundus Joint Master’s program
                </strong>
                is designed to provide students with a robust and interdisciplinary education that spans the full breadth of neuroscience—from molecular and cellular mechanisms to cognitive and behavioral processes.
               </p>
               <p>
                Here’s what sets Neurasmus apart academically:
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  World-Class Faculty:
                 </strong>
                 Learn from leading international researchers who are not just educators but active contributors to the advancement of neuroscience.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Cutting-Edge Curriculum:
                 </strong>
                 Stay ahead of the curve with a program that evolves alongside the latest discoveries and technologies in neuroscience.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Research Opportunities:
                 </strong>
                 Benefit from hands-on experience in state-of-the-art laboratories, gaining practical skills through lab rotations and internships.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Global Reputation:
                 </strong>
                 Study at some of Europe’s most prestigious universities, whose academic rigor and innovation are recognized worldwide.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Collaborative Approach:
                 </strong>
                 Engage with peers and faculty in small classes that foster meaningful interaction and personalized learning experiences.
                </li>
               </ul>
               <p>
                As a Neurasmate, you will graduate not only with advanced knowledge but also with the confidence and expertise needed to
                <strong>
                 excel in any neuroscience-related field
                </strong>
                .
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="Annual meeting Bordeaux 2018" class="wp-image-1617" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 980px) 980px, (min-width: 981px) and (max-width: 1280px) 1280px, (min-width: 1281px) 1600px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux.jpg 1600w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-1280x1600.jpg 1280w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-980x1225.jpg 980w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-480x600.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="2000" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201600%202000'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="2018AM_Bordeaux" width="1600"/>
               <noscript>
                <img alt="Annual meeting Bordeaux 2018" class="wp-image-1617" decoding="async" height="2000" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 980px) 980px, (min-width: 981px) and (max-width: 1280px) 1280px, (min-width: 1281px) 1600px, 100vw" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux.jpg" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux.jpg 1600w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-1280x1600.jpg 1280w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-980x1225.jpg 980w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2018AM_Bordeaux-480x600.jpg 480w" title="2018AM_Bordeaux" width="1600"/>
               </noscript>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                An environment for personal and professional growth
               </h2>
               <p>
                Neurasmus offers more than academic excellence—it provides a holistic learning environment that supports your growth on every level.
               </p>
               <h3>
                A multicultural experience
               </h3>
               <p>
                Being a Neurasmate means embracing diversity. You’ll join a community that brings together students from all over the world, creating a vibrant intercultural experience that enhances both your personal and professional perspectives.
               </p>
               <h3>
                Study at Europe’s top universities
               </h3>
               <p>
                Through Neurasmus, you’ll have the unique opportunity to study at two or more of Europe’s most prestigious institutions, gaining a well-rounded education while immersing yourself in different academic and cultural environments.
               </p>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 <em>
                  🎓  Join Neurasmus and become part of a global community shaping the future of neuroscience through innovation, collaboration, and academic excellence.
                 </em>
                </strong>
               </p>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 <em>
                 </em>
                </strong>
               </p>
               <h3>
                Expertise
               </h3>
               <p>
                Neurasmus offers advanced scientific education and training delivered by international experts. From theoretical frameworks to cutting-edge experimental techniques, you’ll learn from those at the forefront of neuroscience research.
               </p>
               <h3>
                Innovation
                <em>
                 <br/>
                </em>
               </h3>
               <p>
                Dive into innovative and interdisciplinary methods in brain research. Neurasmus emphasizes hands-on learning, integrating the latest technologies and approaches across molecular, cellular, and systems neuroscience.
               </p>
               <h3>
                Friendly
               </h3>
               <p>
                A welcoming and supportive atmosphere is at the heart of the Neurasmus experience. Our friendly and intercultural learning environment ensures you feel connected, valued, and inspired every step of the way.
               </p>
               <h3>
                Proximity
               </h3>
               <p>
                With small class sizes, Neurasmus fosters close contact between students and faculty. You’ll benefit from personalized mentorship and a collaborative learning environment that helps you excel.
               </p>
               <h3>
                <strong>
                 Save Money
                </strong>
               </h3>
               <p>
                Neurasmus makes excellence accessible. With attractive fee waivers and multiple scholarships, you can focus on your studies without financial stress.
               </p>
               <h2>
                Discover Neurasmus and unlock your full potential.
               </h2>
               <p>
                By choosing Neurasmus, you’re not just advancing your academic journey—you’re joining a lifelong community of learners and leaders in neuroscience.
                <strong>
                 Ready to become a Neurasmate?
                </strong>
                <a href="https://emundus-neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/index.php">
                 Apply now
                </a>
                and take the first step toward shaping the future of neuroscience.
               </p>
               <p>
                <em>
                 <strong>
                 </strong>
                </em>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             Our Program in Neuroscience
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            The Neurasmus Master’s program is a unique educational journey designed to equip students with advanced knowledge and skills in neuroscience. This
            <strong>
             two-year program
            </strong>
            , taught in English, provides an interdisciplinary approach to understanding brain function in both health and disease.
           </p>
           <p>
            As a Neurasmate, you will benefit from a
            <strong>
             world-class curriculum delivered by prestigious European universities
            </strong>
            , access to cutting-edge research facilities, and the opportunity to engage in meaningful international mobility. Our program is not just about gaining academic expertise; it’s about building a global network, fostering innovation, and shaping the future of neuroscience.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_2_tb_header et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty">
        </div>

    <div id="et-main-area">
     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-241734 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-241734">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Program Structure and Mobility
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                Neurasmus offers a structured yet
                <strong>
                 flexible framework that combines foundational knowledge with advanced research opportunities
                </strong>
                . The program emphasizes international mobility, ensuring students benefit from diverse academic environments and cutting-edge research facilities. Below is the detailed program content:
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module dvmd_table_maker dvmd_table_maker_0 dvmd_tm_version_3_1_2">
              <div class="et_pb_module_inner">
               <div aria-colcount="3" aria-rowcount="4" class="dvmd_tm_table dvmd_preload" role="table">
                <div aria-rowindex="1" class="dvmd_tm_trow dvmd_tm_trow_0" role="row">
                 <div aria-colindex="1" aria-rowindex="1" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_0 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_rhead dvmd_tm_col_0 dvmd_tm_row_0 dvmd_tm_col_first dvmd_tm_row_first dvmd_tm_col_odd dvmd_tm_row_odd" role="rowheader">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   Semester 1
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div aria-colindex="2" aria-rowindex="1" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_1 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_tdata dvmd_tm_col_1 dvmd_tm_row_0 dvmd_tm_row_first dvmd_tm_col_even dvmd_tm_row_odd" role="cell">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   30
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div aria-colindex="3" aria-rowindex="1" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_2 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_tdata dvmd_tm_col_2 dvmd_tm_row_0 dvmd_tm_col_last dvmd_tm_row_first dvmd_tm_col_odd dvmd_tm_row_odd" role="cell">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   Foundational coursework in neuroscience principles.
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div aria-rowindex="2" class="dvmd_tm_trow dvmd_tm_trow_1" role="row">
                 <div aria-colindex="1" aria-rowindex="2" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_0 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_rhead dvmd_tm_col_0 dvmd_tm_row_1 dvmd_tm_col_first dvmd_tm_col_odd dvmd_tm_row_even" role="rowheader">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   Semester 2
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div aria-colindex="2" aria-rowindex="2" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_1 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_tdata dvmd_tm_col_1 dvmd_tm_row_1 dvmd_tm_col_even dvmd_tm_row_even" role="cell">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   30
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div aria-colindex="3" aria-rowindex="2" class="dvmd_table_maker_item_2 dvmd_tm_tcell dvmd_tm_tdata dvmd_tm_col_2 dvmd_tm_row_1 dvmd_tm_col_last dvmd_tm_col_odd dvmd_tm_row_even" role="cell">
                  <div class="dvmd_tm_cdata">
                   Advanced courses and the beginning of lab rotations.
                  </div>

              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Key Mobility Highlights:
                </strong>
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 Gain a multicultural perspective by studying at a minimum of two partner universities.
                </li>
                <li>
                 Benefit from the academic expertise and state-of-the-art research facilities of each institution.
                </li>
                <li>
                 Tailor your mobility to match your academic goals and research interests.
                </li>
               </ul>
               <p>
                Explore the unique academic opportunities available at each partner university:
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Galway:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.nuigalway.ie">
                  Learn more about the course at NUI Galway
                 </a>
                 .
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Berlin:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.charite.de">
                  Learn more about the course at Charité – Universitätsmedizin Berlin
                 </a>
                 .
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Bordeaux:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.u-bordeaux.fr">
                  Learn more about the course at University of Bordeaux
                 </a>
                 .
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Coimbra:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.uc.pt">
                  Learn more about the course at University of Coimbra
                 </a>
                 .
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Göttingen:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="http://www.gpneuro.uni-goettingen.de">
                  Learn more about the course at University of Göttingen.
                 </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Québec:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.ulaval.ca">
                  Learn more about the course at Université Laval
                 </a>
                 .
                 <a href="https://vu.nl/en/education/master/neurosciences">
                 </a>
                </li>
               </ul>
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Study Tracks
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                Choosing the
                <strong>
                 right university for your first year
                </strong>
                is a crucial decision that shapes the rest of your academic journey. Your specialization options in the second year depend on your first-year university, as
                <strong>
                 only certain pathways allow access to specific partner universities in the second year
                </strong>
                . Planning ahead and aligning your choices with your academic and research interests is key to maximizing the benefits of the Neurasmus program.
               </p>
               <p>
                Below is a summary of the study tracks available at each partner university. This table provides an
                <strong>
                 overview of the program’s structure and mobility
                </strong>
                , helping you make an informed decision about your academic pathway.
               </p>
               <p>
                Each Master’s program has a
                <strong>
                 limited number of spots
                </strong>
                . Therefore, we cannot guarantee you a place in your first-choice program.
               </p>
              </div>

               <p>
                <strong>
                 Key Considerations:
                </strong>
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Plan Strategically:
                 </strong>
                 Match your Year 1 university to the specialization you aim to pursue in Year 2.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Explore Options:
                 </strong>
                 Each partner university offers unique academic strengths and research opportunities tailored to specific fields of neuroscience.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Seek Guidance:
                 </strong>
                 If unsure, consult with program advisors to align your choices with your career aspirations.
                </li>
               </ul>
               <p>
                By making informed decisions about your academic journey, you’ll ensure a seamless progression toward your goals in the dynamic field of neuroscience.
               </p>

          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             <strong>
              Our Partner Universities
             </strong>
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            At Neurasmus, we pride ourselves on collaborating with some of the most prestigious universities in the world. Each of our partner institutions offers unparalleled academic opportunities, cutting-edge research facilities, and a vibrant multicultural environment. Studying at these universities is more than an academic journey—it’s a transformative experience that prepares you for a successful career in neuroscience.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

      <article class="post-241807 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-241807">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular">

            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0 image-crop">

               <noscript>
                <img alt="Galway The Quadrangle Building credit-瑞丽江的河水t" decoding="async" height="517" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/galway-The-Quadrangle-Building-credit-瑞丽江的河水t.jpg" title="galway--The-Quadrangle-Building--credit-瑞丽江的河水t" width="780"/>

             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Photo
                <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Galway#/media/File:NUI_Galway,_2022-05-15_09.jpg">
                 Wikipedia
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Galway
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 National University of Ireland, Galway: a hub for neuroscience innovation
                </strong>
                <br/>
                Located on Ireland’s stunning west coast, Galway combines academic excellence with a vibrant, welcoming culture. Known for its world-class neuroscience programs and innovative research, NUI Galway offers students the chance to work alongside leading scientists in cutting-edge labs. The university is deeply invested in brain health research, providing students access to interdisciplinary projects that make a real-world impact. With its beautiful campus and dynamic student life, Galway promises an inspiring and enriching experience.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_1 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-241815" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 780px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/berlin.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/berlin.jpg 780w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/berlin-480x318.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="517" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20780%20517'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="berlin" width="780"/>
               <noscript>

               </noscript>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Credits
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/@purzlbaum?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Claudio Schwarz
                </a>
                on
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/photos/femme-debout-pres-dun-batiment-TScGhJM716g?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Unsplash
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Berlin
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Charité – Universitätsmedizin Berlin: a pioneer in medical research
                </strong>
                <br/>
                As one of Europe’s largest university hospitals, Charité – Universitätsmedizin Berlin is a powerhouse of medical and neuroscience innovation. Students at Charité benefit from a robust academic program that integrates advanced neuroscience training with real-world medical applications. Berlin’s rich history and vibrant cultural scene provide the perfect backdrop for academic growth and personal exploration. With state-of-the-art facilities and renowned faculty, Charité offers a learning environment where ambitious students thrive.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_2 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242291" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 780px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/bordeaux-city-2.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/bordeaux-city-2.jpg 780w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/bordeaux-city-2-480x318.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="517" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20780%20517'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="bordeaux-city-2" width="780"/>
               <noscript>

               </noscript>

               <p>
                Photo
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/@vincegx?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">

                on
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/photos/batiment-en-beton-brun-sous-des-nuages-blancs-pendant-la-journee-WuOeUt-emsk?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Unsplash
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Bordeaux
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 University of Bordeaux: excellence in neuroscience education
                </strong>
                <br/>
                Renowned for its expertise in neuroscience, the University of Bordeaux is a leader in research and innovation. Its Neurocampus is home to some of the most advanced research facilities in Europe, making it an ideal place for students passionate about studying the brain. The university emphasizes interdisciplinary collaboration, offering students the chance to engage with experts in various fields. Located in a city celebrated for its culture, gastronomy, and vibrant student life, Bordeaux provides an environment where academic excellence meets quality of life.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_3 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242289" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 780px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/coimbra-city.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/coimbra-city.jpg 780w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/coimbra-city-480x318.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="517" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20780%20517'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="coimbra-city" width="780"/>

                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/@josecuenca?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 José Francisco García Cuenca
                </a>
                on
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/photos/un-grand-batiment-avec-une-tour-dhorloge-devant-lui-y3tvS7uQN7I?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Unsplash
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Coimbra
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 University of Coimbra: a tradition of academic excellence
                </strong>
                <br/>
                With a history spanning over 700 years, the University of Coimbra is one of Europe’s oldest and most prestigious institutions. Its neuroscience programs are deeply rooted in innovation, offering students access to pioneering research in neurobiology and cognitive sciences. The university’s blend of tradition and modernity creates a unique academic atmosphere. Situated in a UNESCO World Heritage city, Coimbra provides an inspiring setting where students can immerse themselves in a rich cultural and academic experience.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_4 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242293" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 780px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/gottingen-city.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/gottingen-city.jpg 780w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/gottingen-city-480x318.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="517" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20780%20517'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="gottingen-city" width="780"/>

             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_8 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Photo A.Savin,
                <a href="https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universit%C3%A9_de_G%C3%B6ttingen#/media/Fichier:G%C3%B6ttingen_asv2022-06_img42_Uni_Aula_Wilhelmsplatz.jpg">
                 Wikipedia
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_9 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Göttingen
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 University of Göttingen: a center for cutting-edge research
                </strong>
                <br/>
                The University of Göttingen is synonymous with scientific excellence. With a strong focus on neuroscience, it provides students with access to one of the most dynamic research environments in Europe. Home to the Göttingen Graduate School for Neurosciences, Biophysics, and Molecular Biosciences (GGNB), the university offers unparalleled training opportunities. Göttingen’s academic community is renowned for fostering innovation and collaboration, ensuring students gain both theoretical knowledge and practical expertise.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_5 image-crop">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-242292" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 780px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/quebec-city.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/quebec-city.jpg 780w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/quebec-city-480x318.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="517" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20780%20517'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="quebec-city" width="780"/>

                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/@julie_boulanger?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Julie Boulanger
                </a>
                on
                <a href="https://unsplash.com/fr/photos/batiments-en-beton-blanc-et-brun-pres-dun-plan-deau-pendant-la-journee-1k8qPvGpi8Q?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash">
                 Unsplash
                </a>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_11 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Québec
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Université Laval, Québec: excellence across continents
                </strong>
                <br/>
                Located in the heart of Québec City, Université Laval offers students the chance to experience a unique blend of European and North American academic cultures. Its neuroscience programs are internationally recognized for their focus on neurodegenerative diseases, brain plasticity, and clinical research. Students benefit from close mentorship by world-renowned faculty and access to cutting-edge technology. Québec City’s stunning architecture, rich history, and welcoming community make it an ideal destination for academic and personal growth.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_12 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Discover the opportunities awaiting you at Neurasmus’ partner universities and take the first step toward becoming a global leader in neuroscience.
                </strong>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_3 et_pb_column_1 et_pb_sticky_module et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
               <div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image">
                <span class="et_pb_image_wrap et_pb_only_image_mode_wrap">
                 <img alt="" class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone wp-image-2735" decoding="async" height="120" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/sidebar-program.png" width="120"/>
                </span>
               </div>
               <div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
                <h4 class="et_pb_module_header">
                 <span>
                  You want a program overview ?
                 </span>
                </h4>
                <div class="et_pb_blurb_description">
                 <p>
                  <a class="button-primary text-center" href="/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Neurasmus-2025-European-master-in-Neuroscience-v2.pdf" style="margin-top:10px; display:block;" target="_blank">

         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             Diplomas
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            The Neurasmus Master’s program is a unique educational journey designed to equip students with advanced knowledge and skills in neuroscience. This
            <strong>
             two-year program
            </strong>
            , taught in English, provides an interdisciplinary approach to understanding brain function in both health and disease.
           </p>
           <p>
            As a Neurasmate, you will benefit from a
            <strong>
             world-class curriculum delivered by prestigious European universities
            </strong>
            , access to cutting-edge research facilities, and the opportunity to engage in meaningful international mobility. Our program is not just about gaining academic expertise; it’s about building a global network, fostering innovation, and shaping the future of neuroscience.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_2_tb_header et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </header>
    <div id="et-main-area">
     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-241823 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-241823">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Awarded Diplomas
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                At our institution, we take pride in offering a diverse range of educational tracks, each tailored to meet the evolving needs of our students. As part of our commitment to academic excellence and global engagement, we provide various types of degree awards, including joint and double degrees.
               </p>
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Double Diplomas
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                For all tracks, students have the opportunity to earn double diplomas, enhancing their academic credentials and global perspectives. These diplomas are conferred upon successful completion of the respective programs and meet the rigorous standards set forth by our institution and partnering universities (local regulations apply).
               </p>
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Joint Degree Initiatives
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                Currently, we are actively engaged in developing joint degree programs to further enrich the academic experience of our students. Specifically, we are in the process of establishing a joint degree for the Bordeaux Berlin/Berlin Bordeaux tracks. This initiative underscores our dedication to fostering international collaboration and providing students with unparalleled educational opportunities.
               </p>
               <h2>
                <strong>
                 Detailed Information on Awarded Diplomas
                </strong>
               </h2>
               <p>
                To provide transparency and clarity, detailed information regarding awarded diplomas for each track is available. Please find below the list of tracks along with relevant information on awarded diplomas:
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Amsterdam:
                 </strong>
                 <span>
                  <a href="https://vu.nl/en/education/master/neurosciences" target="_blank">
                   https://vu.nl/en/education/master/neurosciences
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Berlin:
                 </strong>
                 <span>
                  <a href="https://medical-neurosciences.charite.de/en/" target="_blank">
                   https://medical-neurosciences.charite.de/en/
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 <span>
                  Master of Science (MSc) Medical Neurosciences
                 </span>
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Bordeaux:
                 </strong>
                 <span>
                  <a href="https://neurobim.u-bordeaux.fr/program-at-a-glance.html" target="_blank">
                   https://neurobim.u-bordeaux.fr/program-at-a-glance.html
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 Master Mention Neurosciences de l’Université de Bordeaux
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Coimbra :
                 </strong>
                 <span>
                  <a href="https://apps.uc.pt/courses/EN/course/331" target="_blank">
                   <strong>
                    https://apps.uc.pt/courses/EN/course/331
                   </strong>
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 Master’s degree in Cellular and Molecular Biology
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Göttingen:
                 </strong>
                 <span>
                  <a href="https://www.uni-goettingen.de/en/665824.html" target="_blank">
                   https://www.uni-goettingen.de/en/665824.html
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 Master of Science (M.Sc.) Neuroscience Graduate Program
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Laval:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://www.ulaval.ca/etudes/programmes/maitrise-en-neurosciences-avec-memoire" target="_blank">
                  Master of Science (M.Sc.) Neuroscience, Maîtrise en Neurosciences
                 </a>
                </li>
               </ul>
               <p>
                We remain committed to continuously enhancing our academic offerings and ensuring that our students receive the highest quality education. For further inquiries or clarification regarding awarded diplomas, please do not hesitate to contact us.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

              </span>

         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             Admission: join the Neurasmus program !
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            Join a global community of ambitious students and renowned researchers in the field of neuroscience. The Neurasmus Master’s program welcomes diverse and talented individuals from around the world, fostering a
            <strong>
             vibrant multicultural environment
            </strong>
            .
           </p>
           <p>
            Our admission process is designed to be
            <strong>
             transparent and accessible
            </strong>
            , ensuring that students from all backgrounds can navigate their way to joining this prestigious program. With
            <strong>
             comprehensive guidance and resources available
            </strong>
            , we aim to make the process as smooth as possible for every applicant.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_2_tb_header et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

    <div id="et-main-area">
     <div id="main-content">
      <article class="post-2925 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-2925">
       <div class="entry-content">
        <div class="et-l et-l--post">
         <div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0 et_pb_gutters2">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h2>
                <span style="font-weight: 300;">
                 Your path to joining
                </span>
                Neurasmus
               </h2>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Taking the first step toward becoming a Neurasmate is simple with our clear and well-structured admission process. Below, you’ll find all the information you need to prepare your application and embark on this life-changing journey.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_1 et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_1 inverse et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_1 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                How to apply
               </h3>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                Submitting a successful application is the first step toward your Neurasmus journey. Here’s what you need to know:
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Prepare your documents:
                 </strong>
                 Gather essential materials such as your CV, motivation letter, academic transcripts, and letters of recommendation.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Complete the online application form:
                 </strong>
                 Submit your information and upload your documents via our secure application portal.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Follow key steps:
                 </strong>
                 Ensure you review your application thoroughly before submission.
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_0_wrapper et_pb_module">
              <a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_0 button-primary et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/admission/how-to-apply/">
               Learn more about the application process
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_2 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="Admission : how to apply neurasmus" class="wp-image-242537" decoding="async" height="514" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-how-to-apply.jpg" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-how-to-apply.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-how-to-apply-480x440.jpg 480w" title="admission-how-to-apply" width="561"/>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_1">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-2467" decoding="async" height="304" sizes="(max-width: 250px) 100vw, 250px" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments.webp" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments.webp 250w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/red-dot-ornaments-247x300.webp 247w" title="red-dot-ornaments" width="250"/>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_animated et_pb_with_background et_section_regular">
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_2 et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_3 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_2">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="Results" class="wp-image-242539" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results.jpg" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results-480x440.jpg 480w" decoding="async" height="514" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20561%20514'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="admission-results" width="561"/>
               <noscript>
                <img alt="Results" class="wp-image-242539" decoding="async" height="514" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 561px, 100vw" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results.jpg" srcset="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results.jpg 561w, https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/admission-results-480x440.jpg 480w" title="admission-results" width="561"/>

             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_3">
              <span class="et_pb_image_wrap">
               <img alt="" class="wp-image-2532" data-lazy-src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-dot-ornaments.webp" decoding="async" height="259" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20218%20259'%3E%3C/svg%3E" title="green-dot-ornaments" width="218"/>
               <noscript>
                <img alt="" class="wp-image-2532" decoding="async" height="259" src="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-dot-ornaments.webp" title="green-dot-ornaments" width="218"/>
               </noscript>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_3_5 et_pb_column_4 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                Admission results
               </h3>
               <h4>
                A selection campaign in two rounds.
               </h4>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <p>
                The 1st round is a preselection stage. Applications are reviewed and ranked according to the following criteria: academic grades, motivation, references and English proficiency.
               </p>
               <p>
                In case your application is among the best ranked and thus selected for the second selection round, you will be contacted by the Selection Committee for a face-to-face interview through the Internet about a research paper. According to your performance, you may be selected for the second and final interview about your motivation to join the program and study mobility.
               </p>
               <p>
                Candidates applying for an Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree scholarship: interviews will be performed between the last week of January and the first week of February; Candidates applying under a self-funding scheme: you’ll be contacted a few weeks after the deadline.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_6 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h4>
                Applicants’ Appeals
               </h4>
               <p>
                All the applicants have the right to appeal the decision of the Selection Committee regarding their eligibility to the program. Appeals (only duly signed letters will be taken into consideration) can be submitted by email as pdf attachments to the Neurasmus
                <a href="mailto:neurasmus@u-bordeaux.fr">
                 Coordination Office’s email
                </a>
                ; always within 1 week after publication of the selection results.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_1_wrapper et_pb_module">
              <a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_1 button-primary et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://www.neurasmus.u-bordeaux.fr/admission/results/">
               Discover how results are communicated
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_3 inverse et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters3">
            <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_3 et_pb_column_5 et_animated et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
             <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
              <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
               <h3>
                Key Dates
               </h3>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Timing is everything. Stay ahead by noting the critical dates for the admission process:
                </strong>
               </p>
               <ul>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Application opens:
                 </strong>
                 Mark the beginning of the application period.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Submission deadlines:
                 </strong>
                 Ensure your documents are submitted before the deadline to be considered.
                </li>
                <li>
                 <strong>
                  Results announcement and course start:
                 </strong>
                 Receive your results and prepare for the exciting journey ahead. Applicants will be notified of the application results by email once it is available. Results will NOT be released through any telephone enquiries.
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>
             </div>

               Check all the key dates
              </a>

               <p>
                Becoming a Neurasmate means joining a global network of passionate learners and leading researchers shaping the future of neuroscience. With clear guidance, key resources, and a supportive community, Neurasmus ensures your admission process is as seamless as your transition into the program.
               </p>
               <p>
                Don’t wait—take the first step today and open the door to unparalleled opportunities in neuroscience.

         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <h1>
            <p>
             Joining the Neurasmus Program
            </p>
           </h1>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1_tb_header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
          <div class="et_pb_text_inner">
           <p>
            Embarking on the Neurasmus journey means becoming part of an elite program that blends academic excellence, cutting-edge research, and international collaboration. Admission to this prestigious Master’s in neuroscience is competitive, designed to identify talented and motivated individuals ready to
            <strong>
             shape the future of brain research
            </strong>
            .
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_5 et_pb_column_2_tb_header et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty">
        </div>
       </div>
